analysis.description:
Reentrancy in PreICOProxyBuyer.buyForEverybody (/unique_chucks/23/0xfa8b08da751303d320670febcb9b418cf2d4c226.sol#1139-1166):
	External calls:
	- crowdsale.invest.value(weiRaised)(address(this)) (/unique_chucks/23/0xfa8b08da751303d320670febcb9b418cf2d4c226.sol#1152-1156)
	- tokensBought = getToken().balanceOf(address(this)) (/unique_chucks/23/0xfa8b08da751303d320670febcb9b418cf2d4c226.sol#1157-1161)
	External calls sending eth:
	- crowdsale.invest.value(weiRaised)(address(this)) (/unique_chucks/23/0xfa8b08da751303d320670febcb9b418cf2d4c226.sol#1152-1156)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- tokensBought (/unique_chucks/23/0xfa8b08da751303d320670febcb9b418cf2d4c226.sol#1157-1161)

PreICOProxyBuyer.buyForEverybody (/unique_chucks/23/0xfa8b08da751303d320670febcb9b418cf2d4c226.sol#1139-1166) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- tokensBought == 0

PreICOProxyBuyer.buyForEverybody (/unique_chucks/23/0xfa8b08da751303d320670febcb9b418cf2d4c226.sol#1139-1166) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- tokensBought == 0
PreICOProxyBuyer.getState (/unique_chucks/23/0xfa8b08da751303d320670febcb9b418cf2d4c226.sol) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- tokensBought == 0

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.finalize (/unique_chucks/23/0xfa8b08da751303d320670febcb9b418cf2d4c226.sol#656-671):
	External calls:
	- finalizeAgent.finalizeCrowdsale() (/unique_chucks/23/0xfa8b08da751303d320670febcb9b418cf2d4c226.sol#667)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- finalized (/unique_chucks/23/0xfa8b08da751303d320670febcb9b418cf2d4c226.sol#669-671)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.investInternal (/unique_chucks/23/0xfa8b08da751303d320670febcb9b418cf2d4c226.sol#497-553):
	External calls:
	- getState() == State.PreFunding (/unique_chucks/23/0xfa8b08da751303d320670febcb9b418cf2d4c226.sol#504-517)
	- tokenAmount = pricingStrategy.calculatePrice(weiAmount,weiRaised - presaleWeiRaised,tokensSold,msg.sender,token.decimals()) (/unique_chucks/23/0xfa8b08da751303d320670febcb9b418cf2d4c226.sol#521-524)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- tokensSold (/unique_chucks/23/0xfa8b08da751303d320670febcb9b418cf2d4c226.sol#543)
	- weiRaised (/unique_chucks/23/0xfa8b08da751303d320670febcb9b418cf2d4c226.sol#539-542)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.investInternal (/unique_chucks/23/0xfa8b08da751303d320670febcb9b418cf2d4c226.sol#497-553):
	External calls:
	- getState() == State.PreFunding (/unique_chucks/23/0xfa8b08da751303d320670febcb9b418cf2d4c226.sol#504-517)
	- tokenAmount = pricingStrategy.calculatePrice(weiAmount,weiRaised - presaleWeiRaised,tokensSold,msg.sender,token.decimals()) (/unique_chucks/23/0xfa8b08da751303d320670febcb9b418cf2d4c226.sol#521-524)
	- pricingStrategy.isPresalePurchase(receiver) (/unique_chucks/23/0xfa8b08da751303d320670febcb9b418cf2d4c226.sol#544-546)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- presaleWeiRaised (/unique_chucks/23/0xfa8b08da751303d320670febcb9b418cf2d4c226.sol#545-546)

PreICOProxyBuyer.claim (/unique_chucks/23/0xfa8b08da751303d320670febcb9b418cf2d4c226.sol#1193-1209) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-getToken().transfer(investor,amount) (/unique_chucks/23/0xfa8b08da751303d320670febcb9b418cf2d4c226.sol#1207-1208)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.Crowdsale (/unique_chucks/23/0xfa8b08da751303d320670febcb9b418cf2d4c226.sol#454-485):
	External calls:
	- setPricingStrategy(_pricingStrategy) (/unique_chucks/23/0xfa8b08da751303d320670febcb9b418cf2d4c226.sol#469)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- endsAt (/unique_chucks/23/0xfa8b08da751303d320670febcb9b418cf2d4c226.sol#481)
	- minimumFundingGoal (/unique_chucks/23/0xfa8b08da751303d320670febcb9b418cf2d4c226.sol#484-485)
	- multisigWallet (/unique_chucks/23/0xfa8b08da751303d320670febcb9b418cf2d4c226.sol#469-471)
	- startsAt (/unique_chucks/23/0xfa8b08da751303d320670febcb9b418cf2d4c226.sol#479)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.investInternal (/unique_chucks/23/0xfa8b08da751303d320670febcb9b418cf2d4c226.sol#497-553):
	External calls:
	- getState() == State.PreFunding (/unique_chucks/23/0xfa8b08da751303d320670febcb9b418cf2d4c226.sol#504-517)
	- tokenAmount = pricingStrategy.calculatePrice(weiAmount,weiRaised - presaleWeiRaised,tokensSold,msg.sender,token.decimals()) (/unique_chucks/23/0xfa8b08da751303d320670febcb9b418cf2d4c226.sol#521-524)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- investedAmountOf (/unique_chucks/23/0xfa8b08da751303d320670febcb9b418cf2d4c226.sol#533-536)
	- investorCount (/unique_chucks/23/0xfa8b08da751303d320670febcb9b418cf2d4c226.sol#529)
	- tokenAmountOf (/unique_chucks/23/0xfa8b08da751303d320670febcb9b418cf2d4c226.sol#536-538)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.preallocate (/unique_chucks/23/0xfa8b08da751303d320670febcb9b418cf2d4c226.sol#570-588):
	External calls:
	- tokenAmount = fullTokens * 10 ** token.decimals() (/unique_chucks/23/0xfa8b08da751303d320670febcb9b418cf2d4c226.sol#575-577)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- investedAmountOf (/unique_chucks/23/0xfa8b08da751303d320670febcb9b418cf2d4c226.sol#580-581)
	- tokenAmountOf (/unique_chucks/23/0xfa8b08da751303d320670febcb9b418cf2d4c226.sol#581-585)
	- tokensSold (/unique_chucks/23/0xfa8b08da751303d320670febcb9b418cf2d4c226.sol#579-580)
	- weiRaised (/unique_chucks/23/0xfa8b08da751303d320670febcb9b418cf2d4c226.sol#578-579)

Crowdsale.getState (/unique_chucks/23/0xfa8b08da751303d320670febcb9b418cf2d4c226.sol#808-839) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp <= endsAt && ! isCrowdsaleFull() (/unique_chucks/23/0xfa8b08da751303d320670febcb9b418cf2d4c226.sol#832-839)
	- block.timestamp < startsAt (/unique_chucks/23/0xfa8b08da751303d320670febcb9b418cf2d4c226.sol#828-839)

Crowdsale.MAX_INVESTMENTS_BEFORE_MULTISIG_CHANGE should be constant (/unique_chucks/23/0xfa8b08da751303d320670febcb9b418cf2d4c226.sol#350-351)
ERC20Basic.totalSupply should be constant (/unique_chucks/23/0xfa8b08da751303d320670febcb9b418cf2d4c226.sol#301)
FractionalERC20.decimals should be constant (/unique_chucks/23/0xfa8b08da751303d320670febcb9b418cf2d4c226.sol#331)
